data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Igor Panin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Sochi to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Sochi's Artur Yusupov is on target but unsuccessful.
In Sochi Sochi drive forward through Artur Yusupov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Igor Panin signals a Sochi throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
In the minute 4, Igor Panin awards Sochi a goal kick.
Igor Panin blows against Sochi's Joaozinho for offside.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 8, Marko Dugandzic for the home team is judged to be offside.
Spartak Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
Emanuel Mammana for Sochi has been booked by Igor Panin and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 10, In Sochi Spartak Moscow attack through Ezequiel Ponce. The finish is off target, however.
Sochi have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Igor Panin signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Sochi's area.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sochi surge into the attack at Fisht Olympic Stadium but Christian Noboa’s header is off-target.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Igor Panin signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
Joaozinho (Sochi) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 19, Joaozinho (Sochi) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ayrton Lucas (Spartak Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Victor Moses (Spartak Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Roman Zobnin for Spartak Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
In the minute 24, Attention is being given to Sochi’s Miha Mevlja and play has been suspended briefly.
Sochi's Miha Mevlja looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Marko Dugandzic of Sochi is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 26, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
Sergey Terekhov is booked for the home team.
Jordan Larsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 28, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Igor Panin awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Free kick Sochi.
At Fisht Olympic Stadium, Alex Kral has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 40, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Igor Panin will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Sochi.
The second-half is underway at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Sergey Terekhov of Sochi gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Sochi drives forward and Marko Dugandzic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sochi are pushing forward but Marko Dugandzic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 50, Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Marko Dugandzic (Sochi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Anton Zabolotnyi is on a sub for Marko Dugandzic for Sochi.
In the minute 57, Goal! Sochi have got their heads in front thanks to a Christian Noboa strike.
Anton Zabolotnyi instrumental with a fine assist.
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 60, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a Sochi throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Nail Umyarov is replacing Alex Kral for the away team.
In the minute 62, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Sochi.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a Sochi throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
In the minute 64, Sochi push forward at Fisht Olympic Stadium and Joaozinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spartak Moscow defence.
Sochi needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 70, Spartak Moscow make their second substitution with Ilya Kutepov replacing Jordan Larsson.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
Igor Panin waits before resuming play because Soslan Dzhanaev for Sochi is still down.
In the minute 72, Soslan Dzhanaev is back on the pitch.
Vladimir Fedotov (Sochi) is making a second substitution, with Kirill Zaika replacing Joaozinho.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow just outside Sochi's area.
Important block from the Sochi defence as Ayrton Lucas fires in a strike for Spartak Moscow.
Igor Panin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Kirill Zaika of Sochi smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 79, Igor Panin awards Sochi a goal kick.
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Spartak Moscow will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sochi.
Nail Umyarov (Spartak Moscow) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Kirill Zaika (Sochi) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 84, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
The home team replace Artur Yusupov with Danyl Prutsev.
The away team have replaced Zelimkhan Bakaev with Oston Urunov. This is the third substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
In the minute 88, Spartak Moscow's Samuel Gigot breaks free at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Spartak Moscow attack but Samuel Gigot's header doesn't find the target.
Igor Panin awards Sochi a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Sochi.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Sochi have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Ayrton Lucas (Spartak Moscow) has received a yellow card from Igor Panin.
